sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_csm_lv.CSMLookupVerifyUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CSMLookupVerifyUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSMLookupVerifyUtil = Class.create();
CSMLookupVerifyUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	isActive: function(configId) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_lookup_verify_config');
		if (gr.isValidField('id'))
			gr.addQuery('id', configId);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next())
			return gr.active;
	},
	
    type: 'CSMLookupVerifyUtil'
};

CSMLookupVerifyUtil.CONTACT_CONFIG_ID = '0a20d0c9b360230001f34d43c6a8dc0a';
CSMLookupVerifyUtil.CONSUMER_CONFIG_ID = '1d9814cdb360230001f34d43c6a8dc85';]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-09-24 22:45:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>05683ab8b7302300992561c8ee11a92f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CSMLookupVerifyUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="CSM Lookup Verify" source="sn_csm_lookup_veri">c568950cb360230001f34d43c6a8dc4b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="CSM Lookup Verify">c568950cb360230001f34d43c6a8dc4b</sys_scope>

</record_update>
